Player History
Drafted in 50th round, 799th overall pick, by Boston in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/6/2015, off Kyle Pantoja (KC)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/8/2015, off Charles Barney (CHI)...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/23/2016 to a 4-year deal worth $1,250,000 per year...
Injured on 6/25/2016 with a Bruised Jaw, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Detroit on 9/6/2016...
Traded from Cincinnati to Atlanta on 3/2/2018 (Going to ATL: C Christian Koch, P Raul Freire, P Philip Finklea. Going to CIN: CF John Coughlin, P Thomas Fretwell)...
